name: Max Flight Helicopter Services
about: Max Flight Helicopter Services is a professional flight training school and helicopter tour company based at Kissimmee Gateway Airport, Florida. We offer comprehensive flight training in Robinson R-22 and R-44 helicopters, catering to both hobbyists seeking private licenses and aspiring commercial pilots. Our FAA-certified and world-class instructors provide customized training programs tailored to individual goals and schedules. Students can benefit from our Pilot Mentor Program, connecting them with experienced pilots in various fields. We also provide additional services such as aerial photography, surveys, and power line inspections. With a focus on safety and professionalism, Max Flight equips students with the knowledge and skills necessary to become proficient helicopter pilots. Our friendly and supportive environment ensures a positive learning experience for all students.
